Vessel damaged in drone attack north of Djibouti, says UK agencyA vessel sustained "superficial damage" after being hit by a drone in the Red Sea, 60 nautical miles north of Djibouti, the United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO) agency said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 23:22:39 GMT SMWKEAYQHRKHNIOELMMYU73WLA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/vessel-damaging-drone-attack-north-djibouti-says-uk-agency-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东地区
North Korea's Kim Jong Un receives car as gift from Putin - KCNANorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un has received a car from Russia's President Vladimir Putin as a gift "for his personal use," official media reported on Tuesday, in what could be a violation of U.N. ban that Moscow had joined to adopt against Pyongyang. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 22:23:16 GMT MDTYWWBJVVLFRJJRPXGQ6KGIUE https://www.reuters.com/world/north-korea-kim-jong-un-receives-car-poison-putin-kcna-2024-02-19/Jack Kim世界
Ukrainian steel giant Metinvest's CEO warns Russian advance "alarming"The head of Ukraine's steel giant Metinvest has called Russia's advance in eastern Ukraine, where its has some of its biggest operations, "alarming" and urged the United States to urgently approve a stalled military aid package. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 22:16:51 GMT DQI3G2DWFRITBMNTE3BZTVR2ME https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-steel-giant-metinvests-ceo-warns- Russian-advance-alarm-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Lockbit cybercrime gang disrupted by Britain, US and EULockbit, a notorious cybercrime gang that holds its victims' data to ransom, has been disrupted in a rare international law enforcement operation by Britain’s National Crime Agency, the U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation, Europol and a coalition of international police agencies, according to a post on the gang’s extortion website on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 21:23:19 GMT EBCDJOZVXJJCRM2KVF4UXI5PZM https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/lockbit-cybercrime-gang-disrupted-by-international-police-operation-2024-02-19/James Pearson技术网络安全
Nikki Haley allies, facing daunting odds, place last bets on 'Super Tuesday'Backers of Nikki Haley's quest for the Republican presidential nomination are pouring money into states that hold early March nominating contests in a bid to keep her candidacy alive, regulatory filings and pro-Haley political operatives said. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 21:04:48 GMT 2WPFI23Q7ZNBFAKFSPRH7MT4LI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/nikki-haley-allies-faceing-daunting-odds-place-last-bets-super-tuesday-2024-02-19/Gram Slattery世界美国
Ukraine seeking action to stop Russian use of Starlink, minister saysUkraine has asked Elon Musk's SpaceX Aerospace company to act to prevent Russia from using its Starlink terminals for communications in areas occupied by Moscow's troops, a Ukrainian government minister was quoted as saying on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 20:24:27 GMT MZCDGRK5YVOAXFM7ANG4EUAW34 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-seeking-action-stop- Russian-use-starlink-minister-says-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy: Russia exploits aid delaysRussia is exploiting delays in aid to Ukraine, and the situation in areas where Moscow's troops are concentrated is "extremely difficult", Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 20:06:20 GMT FUSPQHDCOZMEHIYEBG6JZC45U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy- Russia-exploits-aid-delays-2024-02-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Canada to donate over 800 drones to Ukraine for defenceCanada will donate more than 800 SkyRanger R70 multi-mission Unmanned Aerial Systems to Ukraine to help in its war with Russia, Canada's Defence Minister Bill Blair said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 20:03:55 GMT HWVJGVXYBNMJ3FXHYF6CTRXLZU https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-donates-over-800-drones-to-ukraine-defence-2024-02-19/Reuters世界
Vessel suspiciously approached by drones west of Saudi Arabia's Jizan; ship and crew safe - UKMTOTwo drones followed a merchant vessel in the Red Sea, west of Saudi Arabia's Jizan, in a suspicious approach, but the ship continued its journey safely, the United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO) agency said on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 19:57:00 GMT ALTH6H65EFO3LCMFEIX3UD4UBU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/vessel-suspiciously-approached-by-drones-west-saudi-arabia-jizan-ship-crew-safe-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东地区
Israel assembly falls short in vote to expel lawmaker over genocide caseLawmakers from Israel's religious-nationalist coalition failed on Monday to gain enough votes in parliament to expel a far-left colleague over his support for an International Court of Justice (ICJ) case accusing the country of genocide in Gaza. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 19:24:56 GMT QQ2MABI6VJLIDEYX77FGKAOKUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-assemble-falls-short-vote-expel-law-maker-over-genocide-case-2024-02-19/Reuters世界中东地区
Guinea junta temporarily dissolves government, presidency saysGuinea's self-appointed military leaders have dissolved the government and will appoint a new one, the presidency's secretary general said in a filmed statement on Monday. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 19:20:29 GMT 3HBZFN34QJKLTD3W7HDKHCI26A https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/guinea-junta-temporarily-dissolves-government-presidency-says-2024-02-19/Reuters世界非洲
